BlogWiki is a relatively simple wiki which is intended to be used as a small blog or personal website.
It is released under the BSD license.

Example: http://www.danomagnum.com

SourceForge: http://sourceforge.net/projects/blogwiki/

Features:
*Namespace Support
*Auto-generated Contents
*Theme Support
*Group-based user accounts
*Decent WikiMarkup

----
CategoryBlog
